Scenes from the massive missile strike on Zaporizhzhia City. More than 45 missiles, drones, rockets, and KABs were used on targets in the city.
Scenes from the massive missile strike on Zaporizhzhia City. More than 45 missiles, drones, rockets, and KABs were used on targets in the city.
Last night, several Russian Geran-2 drones impacted Boryspil International Airport in Kyiv Oblast. NASA FIRMS data shows a large fire burning in the area of the hangars.
Last night, several Russian Geran-2 drones impacted Boryspil International Airport in Kyiv Oblast. NASA FIRMS data shows a large fire burning in the area of the hangars.

Emergency power outages have been implemented in several regions of Ukraine due to the massive Russian missile strikes tonight. 
Keep in mind, this is on top of the already scheduled rolling power outages currently in place for almost all regions.

Russian forces have captured the village of Vyshneve, Pokrovsk'e direction, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~926.
Total land area: ~1.94 km¬≤.

The Ukrainian soldiers still stationed and effectively encircled at the bottom of the Pokrovsk pocket in Lysivka and Sukhyi Yar remind me of those who were encircled in the industrial zones outside Avdiivka. 
Neither time were they given the order to withdraw in time, even though there were weeks of opportunities to do so. 
The Ukrainian command does not care about these soldiers and is happy to use them to delay the collapse of their PR cities for propaganda purposes. This is absolutely disgusting and should be a wakeup call for those who still think otherwise.

The next round of map updates will come tomorrow once I have the energy to post about it. I covered the missile attack for over 12 hours straight with no breaks today lol.
This means some of the info provided will be slightly delayed, but there will be a lot to talk about regarding Pokrovsk. It also means some of the other Ukraine-related news I planned to post about wont be covered today.

One of the targets of last night's massive missile strike on Zaporizhzhia City was the Zaporizhzhia Cable Plant, as evidenced by this geolocation. A large fire was seen burning there into the morning hours.
Explosions in Dnipro. A Grom-E1 rocket-powered glide-bomb just impacted the city.

David, if you're so supportive of the Ukrainian command letting thousands of Ukrainian soldiers get encircled, maybe you should go fight! 
But I doubt they would want a 500 kg behemoth like you fighting, even though Ukraine has such a critical shortage of manpower.

Russian forces have captured the village of Krasnohirske, Pokrovske direction, Zaporizhzhia Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~23.
Total land area: ~0.21 km¬≤.

Russian forces have captured the village of Pleshchiivka, Kostyantynivka direction, Donetsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~591.
Total land area: ~0.78 km¬≤

Russian forces have captured the village of Nelipivka, Kostyantynivka direction, Donetsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~41.
Total land area: ~0.12 km¬≤.

Ukrainian UAVs and jet drones attacked the city of Oryol. 
4 drones have impacted the Oryol Power Plant, with each striking a different part of the plant, resulting in a wider area of damage. Fires are now burning at the impact sites. 
Earlier (yesterday), the Schastia Power Plant in Luhansk Oblast was hit. 
Oryol Power Plant Coordinates: 52.98758, 36.09922

Ukrainian UAVs and jet drones attacked the city of Oryol. 
4 drones have impacted the Oryol Power Plant, with each striking a different part of the plant, resulting in a wider area of damage. Fires are now burning at the impact sites. 
Earlier (yesterday), the Schastia Power Plant in Luhansk Oblast was hit. 
Oryol Power Plant Coordinates: 52.98758, 36.09922

At least two Ukrainian UAVs have struck the Vladimirskaya 750 kV electrical substation in the city of Vladimir. A fire has broken out as a result, and continues to burn. 
Coordinates: 56.10217, 40.21553

At least two Ukrainian UAVs have struck the Vladimirskaya 750 kV electrical substation in the city of Vladimir. A fire has broken out as a result, and continues to burn. 
Coordinates: 56.10217, 40.21553
Military Situation In Ukraine On October 30, 2025 (Maps Update)
Military Situation In Ukraine On October 30, 2025 (Maps Update)

When the Hunter Becomes the Prey: "Might Makes Right" in Ukraine's Conscription
Tensions are rising within Ukrainian society. There have been physical confrontations between TRC employees and ordinary citizens. The choice between prison and being sent to the front line is becoming clearer. A person‚Äôs level of physical fitness could mean the difference between life and death.
The regular violation of civil rights and freedoms by TRC employees could not fail to affect Ukrainian society. The use of physical violence, bribery, and frequent deaths in unclear circumstances among ‚Äòconscripted‚Äô men have created a very negative image of military recruiters among Ukrainians.
The Ukrainian media published a photograph of a deceased man who had been forcibly taken to the Rivne TRC. According to official statements, the conscript died of heart failure. The autopsy revealed no signs of violent death.

Iran Is Making More Missiles Despite UN Sanctions
Iran has likely ramped up efforts to rebuild its missile program despite the recent reimposition of sanctions by the United Nations, CNN reported on October 29, citing European intelligence sources.
According to the report, several shipments of sodium perchlorate, a key chemical used in producing solid rocket fuel, arrived from China at the Iranian port of Bandar Abbas in late September.
The UN sanctions were reimposed earlier on the same month under the ‚Äúsnapback‚Äù mechanism of the 2015 nuclear deal. The sanctions prevent Iran from developing or testing ballistic missiles capable of carrying nuclear weapons. Both China and Russia opposed the reinstatement.
üëâ

Winter is Coming. Ukraine's Energy System Under Powerful Russian Strike
On the night of October 29-30, 2025, Russia launched one of the largest combined attacks on Ukraine's energy infrastructure since the beginning of the conflict. The primary targets were major thermal power plants in the western and central energy hubs: 
the Ladyzhynska, Dobrotvirska, and Burshtynska Thermal Power Plants (TPPs),
 which facilitate power transmission to western regions. According to the Ukrainian Air Force, a total of 
653
 attack UAVs of various types and 
52
 missiles were launched. 
According to a¬†Bild report citing Ukrainian sources, the upcoming winter could be the most difficult for Ukraine. Since the conflict began, DTEK facilities alone have been targeted in 210 missile and drone attacks, with 54 attacks directed at a single power plant. The report states that 55-60% of Ukraine's gas infrastructure is already seriously damaged, threatening a collapse of the country's energy system.
üëâ

ISRAELI STRIKES THREATEN CEASEFIRES ON TWO FRONTS

Breakthrough In Hai And Battles For Novopavlivka: Russia Increases Pressure On Ukraine
In the Dnipropetrovsk sector, Russian forces are encircling Novopavlivka. The forces have also broken through to the eastern outskirts of Lyman. 
According to a Chinese publication, over half of the Ukrainian Armed Forces servicemen who have died are foreign mercenaries.
